mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE, BOARD_CATE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD_DETAIL ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC;
SELECT BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD_DETAIL WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_DETAIL (BOARD_CODE, BOARD_CATE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_COMMENT_COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (#{boardCode}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardSeq}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, 0, NOW(), 0, #{boardContent})
